TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于调用编译器的参数。

span.span: Represents the parameters used to invoke a compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象表示的设置和选项接口。A object represents the settings and options for an interface. 如果您正在编译的可执行程序，则必须设置属性`true`。If you are compiling an executable program, you must set the property to `true`. 当设置为`false`，编译器将生成类库。When the is set to `false`, the compiler will generate a class library. 默认情况下，新使用初始化其属性设置为`false`。By default, a new is initialized with its property set to `false`. 如果要从 CodeDOM 图编译可执行文件，则必须在该图中定义 。If you are compiling an executable from a CodeDOM graph, a must be defined in the graph. 如果有多个代码的入口点，您可以指示定义入口点，以通过设置类的名称使用的类属性。If there are multiple code entry points, you can indicate the class that defines the entry point to use by setting the name of the class to the property. 你可以指定中的输出程序集的文件名称属性。You can specify a file name for the output assembly in the property. 否则，将使用默认的输出文件名。Otherwise, a default output file name will be used. 若要生成的程序集中包含调试信息，请设置属性`true`。To include debug information in a generated assembly, set the property to `true`. 如果你的项目引用任何程序集，则必须在中作为项中指定的程序集名称设置为属性调用编译时使用。If your project references any assemblies, you must specify the assembly names as items in a set to the property of the used when invoking compilation. 你可以编译的程序集中的通过设置写入到内存，而不是磁盘属性`true`。You can compile an assembly that is written to memory rather than disk by setting the property to `true`. 在内存中生成程序集时，代码可从 的 属性中获取对生成的程序集的引用。When an assembly is generated in memory, your code can obtain a reference to the generated assembly from the property of a . 如果程序集写入到磁盘，你可以从生成的程序集获取路径属性。If an assembly is written to disk, you can obtain the path to the generated assembly from the property of a . 若要指定暂停编译的警告等级，请将 属性设置为一个整数，表示暂停编译的警告等级。To specify a warning level at which to halt compilation, set the property to an integer that represents the warning level at which to halt compilation. 你还可以配置编译器通过设置遇到警告如果暂停编译属性`true`。You can also configure the compiler to halt compilation if warnings are encountered by setting the property to `true`. 若要指定在调用编译进程时使用的自定义命令行参数字符串，请在 属性中设置该字符串。To specify a custom command-line arguments string to use when invoking the compilation process, set the string in the property. 如果在调用编译器进程时需要 Win32 安全令牌，请在 属性中指定该令牌。If a Win32 security token is required to invoke the compiler process, specify the token in the property. 若要在编译的程序集包括.NET Framework 资源文件，将添加到的资源文件的名称属性。To include .NET Framework resource files in the compiled assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要引用了另一个程序集中的.NET Framework 资源，将添加到的资源文件的名称属性。To reference .NET Framework resources in another assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要包含在编译的程序集中的 Win32 资源文件，指定的名称中的 Win32 资源文件属性。To include a Win32 resource file in the compiled assembly, specify the name of the Win32 resource file in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的示例生成一个简单的 Hello World 程序一个 CodeDOM 源关系图。The following example builds a CodeDOM source graph for a simple Hello World program. 然后，源将保存到文件，编译到可执行文件，并运行。The source is then saved to a file, compiled into an executable, and run. `CompileCode`方法演示了如何使用类可指定各种编译器设置和选项。The `CompileCode` method illustrates how to use the class to specify various compiler settings and options. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CompilerOptions { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置调用编译器时使用的可选命令行参数。

span.span: Gets or sets optional command-line arguments to use when invoking the compiler.

value.span: 用于编译器的任何附加命令行参数。

span.span: Any additional command-line arguments for the compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用命令行编译器时，通常包括在命令行上的此字符串。An typically includes this string on the command line when invoking a command-line compiler. 默认情况下，此属性包含一个空字符串。By default, this property contains an empty string. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CoreAssemblyFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含基类类型（如 、 或 ）的核心或标准程序集的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the core or standard assembly that contains basic types such as , , or .

value.span: 包含基本类型的核心程序集的名称。

span.span: The name of the core assembly that contains basic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是空字符串或 `null`，则编译器将使用默认核心程序集。If the value of this property is an empty string or `null`, the compiler uses the default core assembly. 根据编译器版本，默认核心程序集可能是位于 Framework 目录或引用程序集目录中的 mscorlib.dll 或 System.Runtime.dll。Depending on the compiler version, the default core assembly may be mscorlib.dll or System.Runtime.dll in a Framework directory or reference assembly directory. 如果此属性的值不为空，则代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM) 将显式引用指定程序集并发出导致编译器在编译期间不隐式引用任何程序集的编译器选项。If the value of this property is not empty, the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) explicitly references the specified assembly and emits compiler options that cause the compiler to not reference any assemblies implicitly during compilation.. 对于默认情况下仅隐式引用核心或标准程序集的编译器，此属性可单独使用。For compilers that reference the core or standard assembly only implicitly by default, this property can be used on its own. 对于隐式引用程序集此外核心或标准程序集的编译器，使用此选项可能需要指定在额外的条目属性。For compilers that implicitly reference assemblies in addition to the core or standard assembly, using this option may require specifying additional entries in the property. > [!NOTE] > 或 实现可以选择忽略此属性。An or implementation may choose to ignore this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EmbeddedResources As StringCollection

summary.span: 获取要在编译程序集输出时包含的 .NET Framework 资源文件。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files to include when compiling the assembly output.

value.span: 一个集合，包含要在生成的程序集中包含的 .NET Framework 资源的文件路径。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources to include in the generated assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嵌入的资源是内置于生成的程序集输出文件。Embedded resources are built into the generated assembly output file. 包括通过此属性的文件将类似于`/resource`支持许多.NET Framework 编译器的命令行自变量。Including files through this property is similar to the `/resource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 并非所有的编译器支持.NET Framework 资源文件，因此你应通过调用来测试此支持具有标志方法。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 将一个或多个.NET Framework 资源文件路径添加到返回将嵌入已编译的程序集中的文件资源。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to embed the file resources in the compiled assembly. 添加重复或无效的文件路径会导致编译错误;确保每个字符串指定有效的.NET Framework 资源文件的唯一路径。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用以便将包含在默认或非特定区域性.NET Framework 资源程序集; 使用属性来引用附属程序集中的.NET Framework 资源。Use to include default or neutral culture .NET Framework resources for an assembly; use the property to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

value.span: 如果应生成可执行文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an executable should be generated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是`false`，将生成 DLL。If the value of this property is `false`, a DLL will be generated. 默认情况下，此属性的值为 `false`。By default, the value of this property is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 如果应生成调试信息，则为 ；否则为 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LinkedResources As StringCollection

summary.span: 获取当前源中引用的 .NET Framework 资源文件。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files that are referenced in the current source.

value.span: 一个集合，包含源要引用的 .NET Framework 资源的文件路径。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources that are referenced by the source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接的资源文件都允许无需将实际的资源嵌入程序集中引用.NET Framework 资源程序集。Linked resource files allow your assembly to reference .NET Framework resources without embedding the actual resources in the assembly. 引用通过此属性的文件是类似于`/linkresource`支持许多.NET Framework 编译器的命令行自变量。Referencing files through this property is similar to the `/linkresource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 并非所有的编译器支持.NET Framework 资源文件，因此你应通过调用来测试此支持具有标志方法。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 将一个或多个.NET Framework 资源文件路径添加到返回在编译的程序集创建的资源的链接。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to create links for the resources in the compiled assembly. 添加重复或无效的文件路径会导致编译错误;确保每个字符串指定有效的.NET Framework 资源文件的唯一路径。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用来引用在附属程序集的.NET Framework 资源本地化针对特定区域性; 使用属性将资源嵌入编译的程序集。Use to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies, localized for a particular culture; use the property to embed the resources into the compiled assembly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取当前项目所引用的程序集。

span.span: Gets the assemblies referenced by the current project.

value.span: 一个集合，包含由源引用以进行编译的程序集名称。

span.span: A collection that contains the assembly names that are referenced by the source to compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串集合应包含，也包括当前项目引用的程序集。The string collection should consist of, or include, the assemblies referenced by the current project. 将程序集文件的名称添加到返回导入程序集清单，并引用当前项目中的程序集类型信息。Add assembly file names to the returned to import the assembly manifest and reference the assembly type information in the current project. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ TempFiles { System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ get(); void set(System::CodeDom::Compiler::TempFileCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含临时文件的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection that contains the temporary files.
A collection that contains the temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的临时文件将保留或删除基于值的编译器活动完成后马上集合中的属性。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 属性设置的集合在创建使用如果具有构造函数`keepFiles`参数设置为`true`。The property is set if the collection is created using the constructor with the `keepFiles` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定各种编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TreatWarningsAsErrors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将警告视为错误。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to treat warnings as errors.

value.span: 如果应将警告视为错误，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if warnings should be treated as errors; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取或设置在创建编译器进程时使用的用户标记。

span.span: Gets or sets the user token to use when creating the compiler process.
The user token to use.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WarningLevel { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置使编译器中止编译的警告等级。

span.span: Gets or sets the warning level at which the compiler aborts compilation.

value.span: 使编译器中止编译的警告级别。

span.span: The warning level at which the compiler aborts compilation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Win32Resource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要链接到已编译程序集中的 Win32 资源文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets the file name of a Win32 resource file to link into the compiled assembly.

value.span: 要链接到已编译程序集中的 Win32 资源文件。

span.span: A Win32 resource file that will be linked into the compiled assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接文件通过此属性是类似于`/winres`和`/winresource`支持许多.NET Framework 编译器的命令行自变量。Linking files through this property is similar to the `/winres` and `/winresource` command-line arguments supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 使用要将 Win32 资源文件编译到程序集。Use to compile a Win32 resource file into the assembly. 使用或使用.NET Framework 资源文件进行编译。Use or to compile with .NET Framework resource files. 并非所有的编译器支持 Win32 资源文件，因此你应测试此支持，然后再通过调用链接的资源文件的代码生成器具有标志方法。Not all compilers support Win32 resource files, so you should test a code generator for this support before linking a resource file by calling the method with the flag .
